column2: Assumption: A month is considered 30 days so 1 month = 30x24 hours = 720 hours = 43,200 min = 2,593,000 sec

Assumption: 50,000 users. Each user accesses and uses the service once per day ? 1,500,000 user session per month. Each user session requires 50 requests/queries ?  75,000,000 requests/queries per month
Assumption: Each user session generates a storage requirement of 1MB on average
